title: Welcome to our project

Bonjour

title: Welcome to our project  bike analyses in Montpellier
text:
Explications
Our project will focus on the following question: “What is the impact of the 2023 Tour de France on bicycle usage in Montpellier, and how have cyclists’ behaviors evolved before and after this major event?”.
The goal is to analyze whether this sporting event, which took place in July 2023, had a significant effect on cycling in the city and if there were notable changes in cycling habits.

title: Welcome to our project  bike analyses in Montpellier
text:
Data

To conduct this study, we have chosen to analyze data on bicycle usage spanning from April to October 2023. This time frame allows us to examine bike traffic before, during, and after the Tour de France, providing a comprehensive view of usage patterns around this event. The selection of this period is crucial for capturing short-term trends related to the Tour and distinguishing them from seasonal or contextual factors that might also influence cycling behavior.

title: Welcome to our project  bike analyses in Montpellier
text:
Introduction

Problematic

Our project will focus on the following question: “What is the impact of the 2023 Tour de France on bicycle usage in Montpellier, and how have cyclists’ behaviors evolved before and after this major event?”.



Goal

The goal is to analyze whether this sporting event, which took place in July 2023, had a significant effect on cycling in the city and if there were notable changes in cycling habits.

title: Statistics
text:
Section

In this page we can see the global statistics.

Nous cherchons à voir s’il existe des différences au niveau de la fréquentation des vélos dans la ville de Montpellier en fonction des périodes : juste avant le Tour de France, pendant le Tour de France, juste après le Tour de France et le reste de l’année.

title: Privacy polity
text:
Introduction

Welcome to BikeProjectTeam7. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information.


1. Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of information: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number (when you fill out a form or subscribe to our newsletter). Usage Data: Information on how you use our site (e.g., pages visited, time spent on the site).


Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We use cookies to enhance user experience and analyze site traffic.



2. How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:

Provide and maintain our services.
Improve the user experience on our site.
Send you promotional content if you’ve opted in.




3. Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do not sell your personal data. We may share information with trusted third-party providers for analytics or marketing purposes (e.g., Google Analytics).



4. Your Rights

You have the right to:

Access your personal data.
Request correction or deletion of your data.
Opt out of data collection (e.g., disable cookies).




5. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [your email address].

title: Terms and Conditions
text:
Section

These Terms & Conditions govern your use of our website BikeProjectTeam7. By accessing or using our site, you agree to comply with these Terms.


1. Use of the Website

You may use this website for personal and non-commercial purposes. You agree not to:

Post any unlawful or harmful content.
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the website or its systems.

2. Intellectual Property

All content on this site, including text, images, and logos, is the property of [Your Website Name]. Unauthorized use of any content is prohibited.



3. Limitation of Liability

We are not responsible for any errors, interruptions, or losses that may occur while using our website. The content is provided “as is” without any warranties.



4. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. Please review the Terms regularly.



5. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by the laws of [Your Country/Region]. Any disputes arising from these Terms will be resolved in the courts of [Your Country/Region].



6. Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at [your email address].
